post.text: I want to see America PROSPEROUS again – that means tax cuts for working families, and lower taxes for small businesses so owners can create more jobs! America will WIN – everyone will succeed and we will have a strong, thriving economy once again! #ImWithYou

comment.author: Kelli
comment.text: Praying for you all! Thanks for hurricane Matthew coming to Florida state We the people gets a break from the media bashing Trump deceiving American people. Democrats party and media have no future for the Country and its people! They don't have any plans for the Country and its people too! Democrats have only bashing Trump on lies and deceiving American people again and again to their faces. Everything that Hillary Clinton do is stealing, lied, deceiving American people, crooks, corruption, latina women and Christian loves Trump from day one!!!!!

replies.author: William
replies.text: And yet, Obama's approval rating is at the highest point since his first year, at 56%. Not a good omen for the other party, historically
